node.excerpt: Ketnet was looking for somebody to showcase the Makey Makey board on the Boeva & the games show. They reached out to me while I was on holiday during the summer, and of course I told them “yes!“. The recordings were the day after I returned home from a 2 week holiday in California, so I was a little…

I had the pleasure to work on another fun project for Ketnet. They’re launching a tv show around gaming, with famous comedian William Boeva as it’s host. During the show, they wanted kids to play a simple game against Boeva. The kids would play using a giant controller, and have to collaborate…

frontmatter.title: Phaser and Arduino game for Ketnet
